title: [Massive] Learner-Centered MOOC Instructional Strategy Evaluation and Improvement Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with MOOC platforms and basic instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners conduct MOOC evaluation projects applying mixed-methods research (quantitative/qualitative) via personal devices, participating in formative assessment processes with iterative expert feedback

learning_goals: Learners will systematically analyze MOOC instructional design elements using the learner-centered teaching method evaluation framework (MEF)
Learners will design MOOC effectiveness verification procedures by applying mixed research methodologies
Learners will propose MOOC improvement strategies in the form of a formal report based on expert validation and field test results
Learners will write a usability evaluation report for educational tools referencing the SUS (System Usability Scale) metrics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
